a_sneaker.description: Felix's new shoes are a size and a half larger.  Some professional basketball players have smaller feet.
a_sneaker.title: A Sneaker

babar.description: Felix has started to carry bags and pouches around with him.  You never know when you'll need to stash a toy car somewhere.
babar.title: Babar

basket.description: This is very Felix:  sitting inside a laundry basket in the kitchen, watching Mom and Dad.
basket.title: Basket

buckaroo.description: He suddenly outgrew a lot of clothes.  Lucie's favorite red overalls no longer fit!  So Lucie opened up the Too Big box.  Things that looked humongous six months ago now are almost too small.  So Felix has a new wardrobe, courtesy of the Too Big box and a few other things Lucie picked up (like this adorable cowboy outfit -- don't tell Felix he has the wrong type of hat).
buckaroo.title: Buckaroo

joyce1.description: Supper at the Joyces.  This time, Felix was old enough to actually interact with Keenan.
joyce1.title: Joyce 1

joyce2.description: Felix has a deep, abiding love of vehicles.
joyce2.title: Joyce 2

nate1.description: Nate came over for an evening.  We watched a Sesame Street music video and played along.  Sort of.
nate1.title: Nate 1

nate2.description: When Nate gets sleepy he plays with his hair.
nate2.title: Nate 2

sylvie_1.description: Felix's nanny, Sylvie, has a house.  It's always full of kids.
sylvie_1.title: Sylvie 1

sylvie_2.description: On warm days the garden is where the action's at.
sylvie_2.title: Sylvie 2

sylvie_3.description: Left to right:  Ezekiel (on his first visit ever to Sylvie), Felix, Anna, Evan, Sylvie, and Georgie (the dog).
sylvie_3.title: Sylvie 3

sylvie_georgie.description: Georgie's patience knows no limits.  He gracefully submits to tugs, tail pulls, hair grabbing and even Ezekiel.
sylvie_georgie.title: Sylvie Georgie

sylvie_rocker1.description: Evan's a very sweet boy.  He doesn't usually go rabid.
sylvie_rocker1.title: Sylvie Rocker 1

sylvie_rocker2.description: That was some ferocious scowl!  It takes a lot to scare the Zekester.
sylvie_rocker2.title: Sylvie Rocker 2

sylvie_table.description: Anna and Felix busily cooperating.  Yay!
sylvie_table.title: Sylvie Table

sylvie_trike.description: The race is on!  What's going to carry the day:  Ezekiel's inability to steer or Felix's inability to pedal?
sylvie_trike.title: Sylvie Trike

z_sleep.description: This started out as a game and turned into goodnight.
z_sleep.title: Z Sleep

description:
Felix has grown a lot lately. His feet have been leaders in this particular area. I don't think even the Hulk's feet grow quite this fast. At least Felix's aren't green.

He's become quite enamored of stuffed animals. For most of his young life he couldn't have cared less about fuzzy furry soft toys. He'd choose metal or plastic every time. Lately though, he's been turning to his teddy bear Nounours and rag doll Martine for comfort and as sleepytime companions.

Sadly, the baby signs are steadily disappearing. For example, he says "fee" for fish instead of his fish mouth sign. It's sad because they were so cute! He's still not pronouncing stuff very well, and it's in a mix of French and English, so people other than Dean and Lucie hardly understand a thing he says.

Dean turned 30. He's said "I'm 30" once or twice, but it doesn't sound right yet. By this point in life shouldn't he be wearing a watch or something? Anyway, the Sun gave him a nasty birthday sunburn. Thanks, Sun. And he bruised his butt playing volleyball. Maybe being 30 means getting injured when doing infrequent sporting activities.
title: July 27
